duties_responsibilities.duty: Independently assess conditions and rapidly arrange multidisciplinary care in the Emergency Department (ED)
Identify and manage challenges, comfort families, and organize teams in high-pressure situations
Achieve the highest distinction given by the American College of Surgeons as a Level I Trauma Center
Provide trauma care and around-the-clock access to a trauma surgeon and operating room
Participate in clinical councils and mandatory weekly classes for emergency nursing education
Thrive in a compassionate culture of care and caring to improve patient outcomes

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Nursing, Current New York State RN license, BCLS, ACLS, PALS, TNCC certification, and Certification in Emergency Nursing (CEN) within 3 years of hire
